text: Very good Italian food plus friendly service. Prices on lunch time makes Casa Da Carlo a good affordable restaurant in the heart of St.Lambert. Their tiramisu is delicious! Will definitely return.

This Italian restaurant in the heart of quintessential St Lambert is just so delicious.

I just discovered it while I was browsing through St Lambert tonight, and you will definitely see me coming back on numerous occasions here, and telling all my family and friends about this place.
They can cook up most dishes you want in pasta, even if it's not on the menu. So we like doing that a lot! I like the vongole, fresh clams as opposed to canned ones.
